--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> Unicron's Hologram:
> 
> "Her fuction was sabotage and spy"Said Unicron while Blacknightmare's
> 
> hologram spin, while Unicron described Blacknightmare's skills the 
> hologram showed them "She has 3 transformation levels: robot, her 
> Beast mode is a raven and an aerial vehicle. Her weapons are feather-
> missiles, her arms hide laser-guns and she's a skilled warrior" and 
> unicron added "her last know location was with maximals"

Cyclonus nodded, "It will be done Lord Unicron!" 

Cyclonus Glanced over at Deepstryke, "Take your team and recover the
female, as well as any other intel that can be recovered."

"Sir!" Deepstyke's voice was harsh and controlled. Without a second
glance the 5 new members of the Minions rose and left the room, a
subdued eagerness in their step.

As the door irised shut behind the five, Cyclonus turned back to
Unicron. 

Vorpal for his part had held his silence until now, but with a small
crafty smile appearing on his face he spoke, "Lord Unicron, what are
your plans for the Earth?"

Preston
(Da'minion)

OOC: Keep in mind Vorpal as well as the 5 new minions are NPC's and if
anyone wants to take control of any of them I am game. It would appear
that the minions are going to active for some time to come! 

MWHAHAHAHA!! >:)
